sentences.sentence: We played rugger together at College.
sentences.translation: 我们上大学时一起玩过橄榄球。

sentences.sentence: A playful way of saying that one was playing Rugby football was to call it rugger.
sentences.translation: 如果想表达某个球员踢英式橄榄球，也可以用比较俏皮的说法称它是rugger（英式橄榄球）。

sentences.sentence: Since World Cup of the first rugger was held in New Zealand 1987, this match every other is held 4 years, this year hold time to come from September 9 on October 23.
sentences.translation: 自1987年第一届橄榄球世界杯在新西兰举办以来，这项赛事每隔4年举办一次，今年的举办时间从9月9日至10月23日。
